name: Mouse Cravings
description:
Hello again everyone!

Today I'm happy to present my second game jam game! I hope that you will enjoy this game even though it is a little bit short.

This is designed to be mostly a thinking type of game. The simple premise is that you are not allowed to walk on the same tile more than once. I made 10 levels to explore this concept. I focused a lot more on the narrative and the feel of the game this time around. I hope that you can feel the difference!

Let me know if you encounter any bugs, or even if you had any comments!

Thanks for playing!
